card.tex: \overrightarrow{grad}f=\frac{\partial f}{\partial x}\overrightarrow{e_x}+\frac{\partial f}{\partial y}\overrightarrow{e_y}+\frac{\partial f}{\partial z}\overrightarrow{e_z} \\ = \frac{\partial g}{\partial r}\overrightarrow{e_r}+\frac{1}{r}\frac{\partial g}{\partial \theta }\overrightarrow{e_\theta}+\frac{1}{rsin(\theta ) } \frac{\partial g}{\partial \varphi } \overrightarrow{e_\varphi } \\ = \frac{\partial g}{\partial r}\overrightarrow{e_r}+\frac{1}{r}\frac{\partial g}{\partial \theta }\overrightarrow{e_\theta}+\frac{\partial g}{\partial z} \overrightarrow{e_z }
